name: DailyAdvice
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily advice
des: On his 68th birthday, famed technology journalist, Kevin Kelly, penned "68 Bits of Unsolicited Advice" as a gift to his readers (see https://kk.org/thetechnium/68-bits-of-unsolicited-advice/). Simply ask Alexa to open Daily Advice, and she'll read you one of those bits, and more if you ask.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
